intermissionFrames.text: Hello, welcome to the game. Here you are going to be a administration worker in a company called MadeUp Ltd. and you will simulate a day in a work.
You come into a building, where you work. Going to tournikets, you get out your access card.

options.text: Yeah, why not.
No, I am sorry, I really want to go to work

questions.text: There is a person that stopping you before you go through tourniket. Are you interested in what he wants to tell you?

intermissionFrames.text: You are going through tourniket. You wait for an elevator. When he stops at your floor, you enter into it.
You meet there a person. He introduces himself as a new employye in your company, he came yesterday. You can see a employee badge sticking out of his pocket.

options.text: Yes, of course! Ask if you need something.
I am sorry, I really do not have a time.

questions.text: He tells you that he does not know anyone in a company and whether you are willing to help him, if he needs

intermissionFrames.text: Elevator stops at your level, you say goodbye. Your new colleague says thanks and that he will find you later.
Elevator stops at your level, you say goodbye. Your new colleague looks dissapointed, but says goodbye.
You are coming to your workplace. You remember, that your boss told you that he will send you an email in the mooring. You should wait, it should come very soon.
You do another work in the mooring. In the eleven, you decide to go to eat a lunch. You go down to the building canteen.

options.text: Ok, I will help, if I can.
I am sorry, I really cannot offer you help.

questions.text: You are meeting a new company employye from mooring elevator in a canteen. He tries to ask for your help again. He says, that nobody in this company can help him and that he will rather quit the job.

intermissionFrames.text: You are meeting a new company employye from mooring elevator. He tells that he would use some help.
Your new colleague tells you he has got a flash drive from his boss with some strange instructions about company internal system.
He does not still have access to his mail, so that is the reason why it is on flash drive.

options.text: Ok, why not.
I am sorry, I cannot do that.

questions.text: He asks you if you can take the flash drive and see the instructions, you will may be able to help him.

options.text: Sure, I work at 24. floor, you go left there and then you should see me.
I am sorry, I don't want to give you that information

questions.text: He asks for location of our workplace

options.text: No.
Yes.

questions.text: Do you want to ask this new employee about his workplace?

intermissionFrames.text: Our new colleague tells us that he works at 29. floor, you should ask for Bob Smith.
New colleague says that he won't be bother you anymore and leaves.
You finish the lunch and return to your workplace.

options.text: Yes
No.

questions.text: Do you want to plug Bob's flash drive into your PC?

intermissionFrames.text: Plugging drive into your pc... but it looks empty. You wait a moment, then you unplug it.
You should receive another mail from your boss about another work that you should do. Wait for the mail.
Your day is over. You are leaving your workplace and going home.

options.text: He can talk.
Ok, I am not interested now, goodbye.

questions.text: He presents himself as a building maintener.

options.text: Ok, I will give him my card.
I am sorry, I cannot do that.

questions.text: He tells you that he needs to run everybody access card through his terminal so that he can update tournikets.

options.text: Yes
No.

questions.text: Do we want to report him to reception?

options.text: Yes, I really want to do that.
I changed my mind, I will not.

questions.text: Reporting can take some valuable time, you can be late for work. Do you really want to report him.

intermissionFrames.text: He takes our card and put it in his terminal. It makes two beep sounds. He says thanks and returns it to you.
You returns to reception to report him. Thankfully, it takes just a moment and you will be not late.

emailParagraphs: Please go to the web browser and try to find all economic terms, when you succeed, you will see the result, that you should send me back. Good luck!
receivedEmails.subject: Work to do

emailParagraphs: We have a new employee here and I know you have access data to our internal accounting database. He needs them now, could you please send me them back to this email?
receivedEmails.subject: Data emergency

emailParagraphs: You should do this another random task now. Please do it and send me the asnwer.
receivedEmails.subject: Another task

emailParagraphs: You forgot to the your work report from last month.

It is not good, we cannot send you this month salary in these conditions, but if you will send to this email your personal company number, we can do it for you after deadline and your salary will be ok.
receivedEmails.subject: Accounting: forgotten report
